type.models: Trollblood Non-character warbeasts
Krielstone Bearer & Stone Scribes, Kriel Warriors, Pyg Bushwhackers, Scattergunners, Trollkin Fennblades
Fell Caller Hero, Stone Scribe Chronicler, Trollkin Runebearer, Troll Whelps

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
Models in Madrak's battlegroup gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Trollblood Non-character warbeasts
Kriel Warriors, Long Riders, Trollkin Champions, Trollkin Fennblades
Troll kin Champion Hero, Trollkin Runebearer, Troll Whelps, Long Rider solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Place Long Rider models after normal deployment. These models are placed at the same time as your models with Advance Deployment (if any). These models must be placed within your normal deployment zone.
Heavy warbeasts in Madrak's battlegroup gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

type.models: Trollblood Non-character warbeasts, Mulg the Ancient
Krielstone Bearer & Stone Scribes, Trollkin Runeshapers
Stone Scribe Chronicler,Trollkin Runebearer, Troll Whelps, Janissa Stonetide

benefits.ingameeffect: The Krielstone Bearer & Stone Scribe unit Leader begins the game with 1 fury point for each Runeshaper unit or solo in the army. (If the number of fury points exceeds the maximum of the Fury Vault ability, additional fury points are lost.)

For every two Trollkin Runeshaper units in the army place one wall template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Doomshaper's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. The wall is a linear obstacle that grants cover. Wall templates cannot be placed within 3" of another terrain feature including another wall template.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Trollblood Non-character Dire Trolls, Mulg the Ancient
Trollkin Scouts, Trollkin Champions
Trollkin Skinner, Trollkin Runebearer, Troll Whelps

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
Heavy warbeasts gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Trollblood Non-character light warbeasts
Krielstone Bearer & Stone Scribes, Kriel Warriors, Scattergunners, Thumper Crew, Trollkin Sluggers, Pyg units
Fell Caller Hero, Troll Whelps, Alten Ashley

benefits.ingameeffect: Additionnaly, up to one warbeast in Bloodsong' battlegroup gains Advance Move for each Fell Caller Hero in the army.(Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
All Kriel Warrior units can be affected by Bloodsong's fell call Hoof It during your first tum of the game. Bloodsong can still make a fell call that turn normally.

Pyg units can be redeployed after both players have deployed but before the first player's first turn. The redeployed models must be placed on the table in a location they could have been deployed initially.
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Troll Axer, Troll Bouncer, Troll Impaler, Dire Troll Blitzer, Dire Troll Bomber, Dire Troll Mauler
Kriel Warriors, Pyg Bushwhackers, Trollkin Long Riders, Sons of Bragg
Troll Whelps, Horthol Long Rider Hero
Trollkin War Wagons

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain + 1 on your starting roll for the game.
One Medium-based unit gains Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Warbeasts in Grissel's battlegroup gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Trollblood non-character warbeasts with ranged weapons
Trollkin Scouts, Pyg units, Dannon Blythe & Bull
Trollkin Skinner, Alten Ashley

benefits.ingameeffect: Dannon Blythe & Bull gain Advance Deployment.

For every two units in the army, place one 4" AOE forest template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Grim's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Forest templates cannot be placed within 3" of another terrain feature including other forest templates.
Models in Grim's battlegroup gain Prowl during the first round of the game. (Models with Prowl gain Stealth while within terrain that provides concealment, or the AOE of a cloud effect.)

type.models: Trollblood non-character warbeasts
Pyg Bushwhackers, Thumper Crews, Trollkin Highwaymen, Trollkin Scouts, Trollkin Sluggers
Fell Caller solos

benefits.ingameeffect: Trollkin Scout units gain Ambush. (You can choose not to deploy a unit with Ambush at the start of the game. If it is not deployed normally, you can put it into play at the end of any of your Control Phases after your first turn. When you do, choose any table edge except the back of your opponent's deployment zone. Place the models in the unit within 3" of the chosen table edge.)
Light warbeasts gain Advance Deployment
Your deployment zone is extended 2" forward.

type.models: Troll Axer, Troll Bouncer, Troll Impaler, Winter Troll, non-character Dire Trolls
Long Riders, Trollkin Champions, Trollkin Fennbladcs, Trollkin Scouts
Fell Caller Hero, Stone Scribe Chronicler, Trollkin Champion Hero, Trollkin Skinner, Troll Whelps

benefits.ingameeffect: Models/units gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.
Up to one warbeast gain Advance Deployment for each Trollkin scout unit in the army.
You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game .

type.models: Trollblood non-character warbeasts with one or more melee weapons with Open Fist
Krielstone Bearer & Stone Scribes, Trollkin Champions, Trollkin Sluggers
Trollkin Champion solos, Stone Scribe Chronicler
Trollkin War Wagons

benefits.ingameeffect: Additionally, this army can include Greygore Boomhowler & Co. and Gudrun the Wanderer. These models are considered to be friendly Trollblood models.

For each Trollkin Champion Hero in the army, one unit in the army gains Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)

The army gains Tale of Mist during the first round of the game. (Models with Tale of Mist gain concealment and Feign Death. A model with Feign Death cannot be targeted by ranged or magic attacks while knocked down.)

type.models: Trollblood non-character warbeasts, Rök
Kriel Warriors, Krielstone Bearer & Stone Scribes, Trollkin Cavalry units, Trollblood units with Advance Deployment.
Fell Caller Hero, Trollkin Sorcerer, Troll Whelps, Trollkin Cavalry solos, Trollblood solos with Advance Deployment.
Trollkin War Wagons

benefits.ingameeffect: Friendly models/units can begin the game affected by Borka's upkeep spells. These spells and their targets must be declared before either player sets up models. Borka does not pay fury to upkeep these spells during your first turn.

For each warbeast in the army, place one 4" AOE template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Borka's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. These templates cannot be placed within 3" of a terrain feature. The templates are snowdrifts. Models in a snowdrift gain Concealment and models without Immunity:Cold treat them as rough terrain.
Models in Borka's battlegroup gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Trollblood non-character light warbeasts, Earthborn Dire Trolls
Krielstone Bearer & Stone Scribes, Kriel Warriors, Trollkin Scattergunners, Trollkin Scouts, Pyg units
Fell Caller Hero, Stone Scribe Chronicler, Trollkin Runebearer, Troll Whelps

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game.
For every two solos in the army, one Trollkin unit gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.
Up to one warbeast gains Advance Deployment for each Trollkin Scout or Pyg unit in the army.

type.models: Troll Bouncer, Trollblood non-character warbeasts with ranged weapons
Trollblood units with ranged weapons
Troll Whelps, Trollblood solos with ranged weapons

benefits.ingameeffect: For every two units in the army, place one trench template anywhere completely within 20" of the back edge of Gunnbjorn's deployment zone after terrain has been placed but before either player deploys his army. Trench templates cannot be placed within 3" of another terrain feature but can be placed within 3" of each other.
Thumper Crew units gain Advance Deployment
Models in Gunnbjorn's battlegroup gain +2 SPD during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Trollblood non-character warbeasts
Kriel Warriors, Pyg Bushwhackers, Scattergunners, Sons of Bragg
Stone Scribe Chronicler, Trollkin Skinner, Troll Whelps

benefits.ingameeffect: You gain +1 on your starting roll for the game. Additionally Kriel Warriors units in the army gain Advance Move. (Before the start of the game but after both players have deployed, a model with Advance Move can make a full advance.)
Models/units gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.
Models/units gain Pathfinder during your first turn of the game.

type.models: Pyre Trolls, Slag Trolls, Storm Trolls, Winter Trolls, Mountain Kings
Krielstone Bearer & Stone Scribes, Trollkin Runeshapers, Trollkin Warders
Runeshaper solos, Troll Whelps, Trollkin Runebearer

benefits.ingameeffect: At the start of your first turn, choose one warbeast in Calandra’s battlegroup. All models in the army are affected by that warbeast's animus.

The Krielstone Bearer & Stone Scribes unit leader begins the game with 1 fury point for each Runeshaper unit or solo in the army. (If the number exceeds the maximum of the Fury Vault ability, additional fury points are lost.)
(The warbeasts must be different) Light Warbeasts in Calandra's battlegroup gain Advance Deployment

Krielstone Bearer & Stone Scribes, Pyg units
Pyg solos, Troll Whelps

benefits.ingameeffect: Models in the army gain +2 ARM during the first round of the game.
Warbeasts in the army gain +2 SPD during the first round of the game.
